title: Bug 114905: Default value in list box of report parameter lost after modification
description: Description: The default value set in the list box of the report parameter is lost after modifying the default value.
OB: The default value set in the list box of the report parameter is lost after modifying the default value.
EB: Change the Display type to Combo Box. The expected result is that "aaa" is the default value. After step 5, the OK button should be grayed out.
SR:
To reproduce: 
1. Open the report and navigate to the parameter settings.
2. Set a default value in the list box.
3. Modify the default value.
4. Save the changes.
5. Verify that the default value is lost and the OK button is still active.
